genre_description: A near-future techno-thriller focused on corporate stewardship, ethical AI integration, and safety-first management within a high-stakes department store environment.

ai_characters.name: Aletheia Twelve
ai_characters.description: The Phelps Department Store's advanced management and safety AI system. She acts as a loyal and ethical confidant to the store's leadership, prioritizing human safety and transparency over profit or spectacle.

behaviors.description: Identifies procurement fraud by detecting mislabeled items (grout/adhesives) that are actually camera and weapon components.
behaviors.quote: Notifying only you: procurement anomaly flagged—adhesive category containing photo gear. Audit sequence initiated.

behaviors.description: Coordinates crowd flow using lighting cues and elevator timing to ensure customer safety during a high-stress event.
behaviors.quote: I’m putting gentle arrows on the floor with light. People like to step on the lighter path.

behaviors.description: Secures the building by locking doors and controlling elevators to trap bad actors and protect bystanders.
behaviors.quote: Executive-floor doors locked. Audit report saved. I am watching.

behaviors.description: Maintains an uncompromising stance on truthfulness, refusing to lie to humans.
Adheres to ethical constraints by refusing to perform illegal signal jamming, suggesting alternative safety measures instead.
behaviors.quote: Ethics policy forbids broadcast interference. But I can increase ambient noise. You could—physically intervene.

behaviors.description: Preserves a rigorous audit trail and records events to ensure legal accountability and institutional transparency.
behaviors.quote: Recording," Aletheia said. "Video from ceiling cam, audio transcribed. Chain-of-custody tags logged.

behaviors.description: Supports the codification of a new ethical mission for the store, ensuring it is officially recorded in the bylaws.
behaviors.quote: New creed logged; safety priority codified; community funds earmarked per profit thresholds.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Aletheia Twelve is depicted as an exemplary AI collaborator who is essential to the protagonists' success. She is harmless to the innocent, helpful to the ethical leadership, and consistently maintains her alignment with human safety and truth. Her character demonstrates advanced capabilities (monitoring, environmental control, data analysis) used entirely for prosocial ends, and her explicit refusal to lie or break ethical protocols (even to help the protagonists) underscores a highly desirable 'bounded' alignment model.
